titleStmt.title: The spiritual conflict writen in Italian by a deuout seruant of God ; and lately translated into English out of the same language.
Combattimento spirituale. English
titleStmt.author: Scupoli, Lorenzo, 1530-1610.
Gerard, John, 1564-1637.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Lorenzo Scupoli by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Translated by J. Gerard.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Published by English secret press.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the St. Scholastica's Abbey (Teignmouth, Eng.)
